title: oc5 rc3: search does not work if in the include_path in php zend is installed
body:
i am getting many errors in owncloud.log file concerning to lucene search:
it is  due to my local zend installation.
i removed zend path from php.ini then it is ok.


{"app":"search_lucene","message":"need mimetype for content extraction","level":3,"time":1362828705} {"app":"php","message":"cannot redeclare class zend_search_lucene_analysis_analyzer at \/opt\/zend\/zendframework-1.12.0\/library\/zend\/search\/lucene\/analysis\/analyzer.php#71","level":4,"time":1362828747} {"app":"php","message":"cannot redeclare class zend_search_lucene_analysis_analyzer at \/opt\/zend\/zendframework-1.12.0\/library\/zend\/search\/lucene\/analysis\/analyzer.php#71","level":4,"time":1362828947} {"app":"search_lucene","message":"need mimetype for content extraction","level":3,"time":1362828986} {"app":"php","message":"cannot redeclare class zend_search_lucene_analysis_analyzer at \/opt\/zend\/zendframework-1.12.0\/library\/zend\/search\/lucene\/analysis\/analyzer.php#71","level":4,"time":1362828989} {"app":"php","message":"cannot redeclare class zend_search_lucene_analysis_analyzer at \/opt\/zend\/zendframework-1.12.0\/library\/zend\/search\/lucene\/analysis\/analyzer.php#71","level":4,"time":1362828990} {"app":"search_lucene","message":"need mimetype for content extraction","level":3,"time":1362828992} {"app":"php","message":"call to a member function getroot() on a non-object at \/home\/arm2arm\/projects\/www\/oc5\/owncloud\/lib\/files\/filesystem.php#313","level":4,"time":1362829018} {"app":"php","message":"cannot redeclare class zend_search_lucene_analysis_analyzer at \/opt\/zend\/zendframework-1.12.0\/library\/zend\/search\/lucene\/analysis\/analyzer.php#71","level":4,"time":1362829024} {"app":"search_lucene","message":"need mimetype for content extraction","level":3,"time":1362829031} {"app":"search_lucene","message":"need mimetype for content extraction","level":3,"time":1362829038} {"app":"php","message":"comments starting with '#' are deprecated in \/etc\/php5\/apache2\/php.ini on line 263 at unknown#0","level":4,"time":1362829095}
